ActJudges Act
SubjectDoris H. Allen ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. H. Ward Allen**
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to DORIS H. ALLEN, survivor of the Hon. H. Ward Allen, a Judge of the Ontario Court of Justice (General Division), effective October 25, 2014.
